# Security Plan Stage
Produce `./tmp/workflow-artifacts/{mode}-security-plan.md` with:
- Threat model (assets, trust boundaries, threats, mitigations)
- AuthN/AuthZ model
- Secrets handling
- Dependency risk plan
- Logging/auditing
- Verification checklist
